thread.title: Aerosmith's Steven Tyler cosies up to busty Bar Refaeli as she flashes her cleavage in rock 'n' roll photoshoot
thread.title_full: Aerosmith's Steven Tyler cosies up to busty Bar Refaeli as she flashes her cleavage in rock 'n' roll photoshoot

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Aerosmith's Steven Tyler cosies up to busty Bar Refaeli as she flashes her cleavage in rock 'n' roll photoshoot
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
His band may be stealing all the headlines thanks to their last EVER tour hitting the road this year. 
But Steven Tyler managed to make some time in-between all things Aerosmith for a special project, as the rocker took a day out to hang out with model Bar Refaeli. 
Nearly 20 years since the pair posed for a seriously saucy shoot for Sports Illustrated, the rocker, 68, and the 31-year-old Israeli stunner cosied up for a glamorous photoshoot for Carolina Lampke. Read More Aerosmith's Steven Tyler and Biffy Clyro's Simon Neil get a very tasty make over for Download Festival Bar and Steven cosied up to each other for the rock 'n' roll shoot (Photo: Carolina Lemke) 
Bar, an international model who has posed for the likes of Sports Illustrated and Maxim, did her best to steal the limelight from Sweet Emotion singer Steven. 
Slipping into a sheer white blouse for some of the shots, the blonde beauty ensured a tantalising amount of skin was on display whilst also flashing her black lacy bra. 
Wearing her top open to the sternum, the Israeli model ensured the eye was drawn to her tanned decoletage. Wearing a sheer white blouse, the model, 31, ensured plenty of attention was pulled away from the rocker, 68 (Photo: Carolina Lemke) 
Modelling a pair of the brand's luxury shades, Bar kept her eyes hidden, though she couldn't keep a smile off her face as Steven played up to his rock 'n' roll reputation - wailing down the camera lens. 
In another series of shots, the two can be seen posing together with Steven leaning on a microphone - which has his customary scarfs tied to it. 
Leaning against the Aerosmith legend in the most nonchalant manner, Bar can be seen posing, hand on hip. Bar couldn't help but flash a tantalising amount of flesh during the shoot for Carolina Lampke sunglasses (Photo: Carolina Lemke) Steven looked every inch the rock and roll icon as he cosied up to the Sports Illustrated cover girl (Photo: Carolina Lemke) Read More Joe Perry returns to the stage with the Hollywood Vampires after collapsing at concert 
Rocking a gold metallic blouse with a plunging neckline, the X Factor Israel host once-again can't help but flash her ample assets and bra. 
Teamed with a pair of high-waisted black jeans, Bar's famous figure is subtly showcased thanks to her pose. 
But ever the professional Steven's eyes are straight ahead, and the father of actress Liv Tyler looks every inch the cool cat in his wayfarer style shades, and silver leather jacket. 
Clearly enjoying themselves the pair also took some time out to film a short video that featured Steven taking Bar for a spin on his beloved motorcycle. The pair even headed out on Steven's hog - but the frontman won't be doing that for a while (Photo: Carolina Lemke) Aerosmith are currently preparing for their last EVER tour, AeroVerderci, Baby! 
Though its safe to say he won't be seeing the open-roads of California anytime soon, as the Dude Looks Like A Lady singer and his band are heading out on their final tour as a band. 
Currently preparing for the AeroVerderci, Baby! tour, Aerosmith will grace Euopean stages for one last farewell this summer - and their only UK date will be at Download Festival. 
Taking place from Friday June 9 - Sunday 12, System of a Down, Biffy Clyro and Aerosmith will take to the stage to headline the main stage over three days. 
Other acts across the weekend include: Biffy Clyro, System of a Down, Steel Panther, Slayer, Alterbridge, AFI, A Day To Remember, and Sum 41. 
Download Festival takes place 9-10 June at Donington Park, Leicestershire. Tickets available from www.downloadfestival.co.uk . Like us on Facebook
